AssociatedProducts.title: Products that can use ACS Quota

AlgorithmSpec.title: Defines how the training job of the algorithm run.

HyperParameters.title: The hype parameter used by the algorithm.

JobType.title: Job type of the training job while running the algorithm.

Command.title: The command used for submit the job.

MetricDefinitions.title: The output metrics of the algorithm.

SupportsDistributedTraining.title: Indicates whether the algorithm support distributed training.

Image.title: The docker image used by the job of this algorithm.

SupportedInstanceTypes.title: A list of ECS instances that the algorithm can use to submit training job.

Channel.title: A named input/output for the algorithm.

Description.title: A brief description for the channel.

Required.title: Indicates whethe the channels is required.

Key.title: The key of the conditional expression.

Operator.title: The operator of the conditional expression

Values.title: The values of the conditional expression.

HyperParameterDefinition.title: Definition of the input hyper parameter for the algorithm.

Required.title: Indicates whether the parameter is required

MetricDefinition.title: Describe the output metric of the algorithm.

Description.title: A brief description for the metric.

Regex.title: Regex use to match the metrics from job log.

ParentQuotaId.title:
父QuotaId
1. 如果父QuotaId为空，表示创建一个根Quota，从专属资源组中分配机器
2. 如果父QuotaId不为空，表示创建一个子Quota，资源从根Quota中绑定的Nodes中分配资源

ResourceGroupIds.title:
专有资源组列表
约束：
1. 只有根Quota允许从（父QuotaId为空）资源组划分机器
2. 指定的资源组列表中的vpc配置需要一致
